articles.content: Scotland's clubs will be warned next week that failure to thrash out league reconstruction in time for next season will effectively press the self destruct button on the professional game in this cou… [+4268 chars]

articles.description: The number one story in Manchester United land right now is the immediate future of on loan striker Odion Ighalo. It's still up in the air.
